text: Hengshan Picardi Hotel Hengshan Picardie Hotel () is an Art-Deco five-star hotel in Shanghai, China. It was constructed in 1934 as Picardie Apartments. ==See also== * Hengshan Road * Park Hotel, Shanghai * Broadway Mansions ==References== Category:Art Deco architecture in Shanghai Category:Hotels in Shanghai Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1934 Category:1934 establishments in China
title: Hengshan Picardie Hotel
